cause.description:
Malaria is the biggest killer of African children, yet it is cheaply preventable and curable with effective drugs, insecticidal bed nets and sprays. Help AFM fight malaria by donating. Your contribution will help us continue to be an indepent voice for effective, integrated and country-driven malaria control programs.
1. No one should a preventable and curable disease.
cause.name: Africa Fighting Malaria
